SCTX:
Begin fireregenScript

short onfire
short hasspell

if ( GetEffect sEffectFireDamage == 0 )
	if ( onfire == 1 )
		set onfire to 0
	endif
elseif ( GetEffect sEffectFireDamage == 1 )
	if ( onfire == 0 )
		set onfire to 1
	endif
endif

if ( onfire == 1 )
	if ( hasspell == 1 )
		RemoveSpell "BM_fireregen"
		set hasspell to 0
	endif
elseif ( onfire == 0 )
	if ( hasspell == 0 )
		AddSpell "BM_fireregen"
		set hasspell to 1
	endif
endif
	








end fireregenScript
